answer:
to purchase airtime from Gtbank type 'GTB:Airtime'
to purchase airtime from First Bank type 'First Bank : Airtime'

dail *737*amount*
to purchase airtime with GTBank
NOTE:You must use a number that is registered with GtBank online banking

Good afternoon <% username %>,
hope you had a nice day.
Here are a list of things i can help you do.
1)make and airtime purchase
2)check your account balance
3)analyse your expenses with seven (7) days befor now
3)make transfer to another account
4)i can also help you with all customer care related issue

please type menu at anytime to see a list of keyword for each activities i can help you with...

Keywords:
Airtime ==> to purchase airtime from your bank
Bank Transfer => to transfer money to a recepient account
Check Banlance ==> to check your bank account balance
My Expenses => to check your expenses within the week
News ==> to check the latest new from your bank
Help => to get help
